text: Conquest is 1937 American romantic drama movie directed by Clarence Brown and Gustav Machatý. It was based on the 1933 novel Pani Walewska by Wacław Gąsiorowski and starring Greta Garbo, Charles Boyer, Reginald Owen, Henry Stephenson, Alan Marshal, C. Henry Gordon, Leif Erickson. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1938. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1937 romance movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown Category:Movies directed by Gustav Machatý
title: Conquest (1937 movie)
